stems_affixes.type_exp: =skill, joint, trick, 表示"技巧,关节,诡计"

stems_affixes.word_buile: art技巧,关节,诡计+ful充满……的→充满诡计的
artifice技巧+ial表形容词→用技巧做出的→人工的
art技巧,关节,诡计+less无→无诡计的
artist[n.艺术家, 画家]+ry状态,性质→n.艺术技巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 艺术, 艺术品, 技术, 巧妙, 美术
stems_affixes.word_buile: art技巧,关节,诡计→n.艺术, 艺术品, 技术, 巧妙, 美术
art技巧,关节,诡计+icle东西→用技巧做出的东西→物品
arti=art技巧,关节,诡计+fact做出的东西,事实→人造物→工艺品
arti=art技巧,关节,诡计+fice做→用技巧做
art技巧+ist人→n.艺术家, 画家

sentences.en: Addis's no ordinary baker—he's an artist.
sentences.cn: 阿迪斯是个非同寻常的面包师——他简直是个大师。</seg>

entry.def: An artist is someone who draws or paints pictures or creates sculptures as a job or a hobby.

example.tran: 一个伟大的艺术家的工作室

example.ex: Each poster is signed by the artist...
example.tran: 每幅海报都有这个艺术家的签名。

entry.def: An artist is a person who creates novels, poems, films, or other things which can be considered as works of art.
entry.tran: 艺术家（如小说家、诗人、导演等）

example.ex: His books are enormously easy to read, yet he is a serious artist...
example.tran: 虽然他是一个不折不扣的艺术家，但是他的作品极其通俗易懂。

example.ex: Engel is quoted as saying that balanced people do not become artists.
example.tran: 引用恩格尔的话说就是理性的人是成不了艺术家的。

entry.def: An artist is a performer such as a musician, actor, or dancer.

example.ex: ...a popular artist who has sold millions of records.
example.tran: 唱片销量达到数百万张的当红音乐家

entry.def: If you say that someone is an artist at a particular activity, you mean they are very skilled at it.

example.ex: He is an exceptional footballer — an artist.
example.tran: 他是一名出色的足球运动员，一个足球高手。

means.word_mean: 1. a person whose creative work shows sensitivity and imagination

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (denoting a master of the liberal arts): from French artiste, from Italian artista, from arte 'art', from Latin ars, art-

sentences.cn: 法兰克是个教师, 同时也是个艺术家.
sentences.en: Frank is a teacher, and an artist into the bargain.

sentences.cn: 艺术家笔下的总统肖像栩栩如生.
sentences.en: The president came alive in the picture as the artist worked.

sentences.cn: 真正的艺术家是不容任何事情妨碍他的工作的.
sentences.en: The true artist lets nothing come between himself and his work.

sentences.cn: 这些最新的画作显示画家已经真正地步向成熟了.
sentences.en: These latest paintings show how the artist has really grown in maturity.

sentences.cn: 这位艺术家有几管红色颜料.
sentences.en: The artist has several tubes of red paint.

sentences.cn: 他受过正统的教育,却立意过着艺术家我行我素的生活.
sentences.en: After a very proper upbringing he chose to lead the Bohemian life of an artist.

sentences.cn: 梦境可以成为艺术家灵感的丰富源泉。
sentences.en: Dreams can be a rich source of inspiration for an artist.

sentences.cn: 画家正为他的下一幅作品画素描。
sentences.en: The artist is making sketches for his next painting.

sentences.cn: 这位艺术家在同一幅画中把不同的画法结合在一起。
sentences.en: The artist combines different techniques in the same painting.

sentences.cn: 除两部作品以外，其余作品全部售出, 总售价高达7千多万英镑,创单个艺术家作品单次销售的最高记录。这是最后一次的胜利。
sentences.en: All but two pieces sold, fetching more than £70m, a record for a sale by a single artist.

sentences.cn: 他的报道可与为《星条旗报》供稿的著名漫画艺术家比尔•莫尔丁创作的“Willie（二战士兵形象）相媲美。
sentences.en: His reports paralleled the “Willie” cartoons of famed Stars and Stripes artist Bill Maulden.

sentences.cn: 地景艺术家们不描绘风景，而是以大地本身这一实物形态作为媒介。
sentences.en: Rather than portraying landscape, land artists usedthe physical substance of the land itself as their medium.

sentences.cn: 英国的地景艺术家，以理查德·朗的作品为代表，不仅在国内更具规模，而且比它的美国同行更古怪离奇。
sentences.en: The British land artist, typified by Richard Long'spiece, was not only more domestically scaled, but a lot quirkier than its American counterpart.

sentences.cn: 博伊尔家族包括艺术家马克·博伊尔、琼·希尔斯和他们的孩子，他们在画廊墙壁上重塑一章章随意的英国风景。
sentences.en: Comprising artists Mark Boyle and Joan Hills and their children, they recreated random sections of the British landscape on gallery walls.

sentences.cn: that are traditionally considered beautiful such as the Lake District or the Wiltshire Downs.但通常英国地景艺术家更喜欢远离城镇，倾向于那些传统意义上被认为是美景的地域，如湖区或者威尔特郡丘陵区域。
sentences.en: Generally however British land artists preferred to get away from towns, gravitating towards landscapes

sentences.cn: 说到哈米什·富尔顿，你会忍不住感慨，这位苏格兰艺术家只是找到了一种方式，来回馈他对步行的热爱。
sentences.en: In the case of Hamish Fulton, you can't help feeling that the Scottish artist has simply found a way of making his love of walking pay.

sentences.cn: 就字面看，可以认为他想说批评家应该比她批评的艺术家更有才华。
sentences.en: In a  straightforward sense, he could mean that a critic must be more talented than the artist she  critiques ( 评 论 ).
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当代艺术家沿袭了这一传统，创作出了与现代人的焦虑产生共鸣的彩绘蛋：
sentences.en: Contemporary artists have followed this tradition to create eggs that speak to the anxieties of our age:

sentences.cn: 一个人必须先是活人然后是死后的艺术家.
sentences.en: One must be a living man and a posthumous artist.

sentences.en: The young artist rose quickly to fame.

sentences.cn: 这样看来, 能够坚持狭小的架上空间创作的艺术家多少有些难能可贵.
sentences.en: So, to insist on a small shelf space the number of creative artists, some rare.

sentences.cn: 我们的一生画得一手好画; 我认为他确实是为失意的艺术家.
sentences.en: Our doctor paints beautiful pictures; I think he's really an artist manque.

sentences.cn: 最后一年, 我专攻军事法.
sentences.en: In my last year, I specialized in military law.

sentences.en: That is his job, says artist Albert who created the character with writer Rene Goscinny.

sentences.en: Once an artist was crossing a river on a small boat.

sentences.cn: 约翰·考美林被公认为建筑家 、 视觉艺术家 、 发明家和自由思想家.
sentences.en: John K ? rmeling is an architect, visual artist, inventor and freethinker.

sentences.cn: 通过赋予颜色,艺术家可以将活力注入照片中原本枯燥的地方.
sentences.en: The artist can bring life into an otherwise lifeless area of a photo.

sentences.cn: 同样, 不健全的科学观使笃信这种科学观的艺术家变得目光短浅.
sentences.en: Equally, the morbid science view makes an artist shortsighted.

sentences.cn: 不要说他是个艺术家, 这是个计算机怪杰.
sentences.en: Don't say this one is the artist, and this one is the computer geek.

sentences.cn: 现在的艺术家仍然对文艺复新时期的艺术珍爱有加.
sentences.en: P > Renaissance art is still appreciated by artists or today.

sentences.cn: 现代艺术家不会从一张白纸起步,也不会从一张空空如也的画布起步. 他们是从存在的作品起步.
sentences.en: Modern artists don't start with a blank page or empty canvas. They start with preexisting works.

sentences.cn: 批评对于艺术家起不到任何作用.
sentences.en: Criticism has nothing to do with the artist.

sentences.cn: 这位艺术家渴望他的天才得到承认.
sentences.en: The artist craved recognition of his talents.

sentences.cn: 许多诗人和艺术家从大自然中获得灵感.
sentences.en: Many poets and artists have drawn their inspiration from nature.

sentences.cn: 当代英国画家作品展
sentences.en: an exhibition of work by contemporary British artists

sentences.cn: 第一期出版后，狄更斯写信给这个画家并建议他修改一幅图画，因为狄更斯认为其并不足够忠实于他的散文。
sentences.en: After the first installment, Dickens wrote to the artist and asked him to correct a drawing Dickens felt was not faithful enough to his prose.

sentences.cn: 狄更斯和他的出版商只是与一位新画家继续合作。
sentences.en: Dickens and his publishers simply pressed on with a new artist.

sentences.cn: 那个画家细心地使模特儿摆好姿势.
sentences.en: The artist posed the model carefully.

sentences.cn: 火车停下来让旅客买点心吃,这时画家只来得及把那座山草草地勾勒出来.
sentences.en: The artist had only time to touch off the mountain as the train stopped for refreshments.

sentences.cn: 国王委托一位画家为皇后画像.
sentences.en: The King commissioned an artist to paint a picture of the Queen.

sentences.cn: 那位画家展现了高超的手法.
sentences.en: The artist shows wonderful finesse.

sentences.cn: 奥姆斯戴德先生说他的女儿逐渐成为一名业余画家,她的作品也在不断进步.
sentences.en: Mr Olmstead said his daughter's work was evolving as she developed into a mature artist.

sentences.cn: 那位画家在完成他的工作之前喜欢润色一下他的作品.
sentences.en: Before the artist finished his work he liked to give it another brush.

sentences.cn: 我们不是画家, 但我们有丰富的想象力, 有着一颗不泯灭的心.
sentences.en: We are not artists, but we a wealth of imagination, there is not devoid a heart.

sentences.cn: 被一个画家充满感情的双手抚慰.
sentences.en: Are soothed beneath the artists loving hand.

sentences.cn: 画家将自己的经历在绘画中表现出来.
sentences.en: The artist executed his own experience in the picture.

sentences.cn: 德加大概算是我最喜爱的彩色粉笔画家了.
sentences.en: Degas is probably my favorite pastel artist.

sentences.cn: 那位画家把我的父亲画得惟妙惟肖.
sentences.en: The artist has succeeded in portraying my father to the life.

sentences.cn: 画家根据记忆画出了这个场面.
sentences.en: The artist drew the scene from memory.

sentences.cn: 依样画葫芦,你就不会成为画家.
sentences.en: You don't become an artist by painting someone else's dots.

sentences.cn: 这位画家在素描上撒粉使其变为暗淡的图像.
sentences.en: The artist dusted the charcoal drawing down to a faint image.

sentences.cn: 知名香港设计家陈幼坚先生喜欢新锐版画家黄恺的作品.
sentences.en: Prominent Hong Kong graphic designer Mr. Alan Chen likes young artist Huang Kai's works.

sentences.cn: 这位画家正在画面上画阴影.
sentences.en: The artist is picking in shadows in the picture.

sentences.cn: 他不太尊敬其他画家的创意.
sentences.en: He had little respect for the inspirations of other artists.

sentences.cn: 那画家自带颜料.
sentences.en: The artist brought his paints with him.

sentences.cn: 那位画家在修改他的画.
sentences.en: The artist was perfecting his picture.

sentences.cn: 精细的刻画,准确的历史细节使画家徜徉于虚幻的国度.
sentences.en: The immaculately drawn images and historical accuracy permit the artist to move into the realm improbable.

sentences.cn: 画家描绘了他在花园漫步的情景.
sentences.en: The artist depicted him strolling through a garden.

sentences.cn: 文艺复兴时期的画家将这样视错觉运用到绘画中.
sentences.en: Renaissance artists applied this type of optical illusion to painting.

sentences.cn: 这些最新的画作显示画家已经真正地步向成熟了.
sentences.en: These latest paintings show how the artist has really grown in maturity.

sentences.cn: 我最初是一名画家,而且对电脑感兴趣.
sentences.en: I had started out as an artist and was interested in computers.

sentences.cn: 如果是一们著名的古代画家, 他的画会贵重得多.
sentences.en: If the painter is a famous ancient artist, the painting would be much more valuable.

sentences.cn: 画家粗略地添加了几棵树,使画面环境颇显生动.
sentences.en: The artist sketched in a few trees to show a vividness in its surroundings.

sentences.cn: 他是打牌能手.
sentences.en: He is an artist with cards.

sentences.cn: 也许我该提醒你这座城市有许多骗子手.
sentences.en: Perhaps I should warn you that this city is full of con artists.

sentences.cn: 她不肯嫁给那个骗子.
sentences.en: She refused to marry that con artist.

sentences.cn: 他究竟是一个杰出的艺术家还是一个江湖骗子?
sentences.en: Whether he is an outstanding artist or a charlatan?

sentences.cn: 她原来是一个超一流的骗子高手.
sentences.en: She turned out to be a con artist of the highest order.

sentences.cn: 这个骗子把伦勃朗的真迹与赝品调包了.
sentences.en: The con artist replaced the original with a fake Rembrandt.

sentences.cn: 该骗子乔装成一位投资银行家.
sentences.en: The con artist was posing as an investment banker.

sentences.cn: 这个大骗子溜进了宴会中.
sentences.en: The con artist angled his way into the dinner party.

Sentence.sentence: Eggs have an oval shape appealing to artists.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Contemporary artists have followed this tradition to create eggs that speak to the anxieties of our age: Life is precious, and delicate.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In a straightforward sense, he could mean that a critic must be more talented than  the artist she critiques ( ' , 评论 ).
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In a straightforward sense, he could mean that a critic must be more talented than the artist she critiques.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B
